comment: Are all reminders being auto backed up in case of permanent loss of phone etc? If not, is there a way to make backups through the app? These are important questions, please respond, thank you

author: Michael Sheard
comment: This is a great app. The developers have done a good job. There's a few idiosyncrasies to get used to, but once you understand them, and how to get the settings right, it's great. I'll play with the free version for a bit longer, but I'll probably upgrade to the paid version. 😁

author: Eddy Q
comment: Nice. At first I thought it was just 2 stars worth but the author got back with me and I tried it again. It is the defaults that are inconvenient. If you don't like the defaults then go to settings and there are lots of customization settings there. I would give it 5 stars except for the default settings. But I would suggest that more options be added for reminder interval. ... For example "remind every 3rd Sat of the month".

reply.author: Atlas Profit
reply.content: Thanks, Eddy. We take into account your suggestions. Good luck!

author: Aidan Horn
comment: I like it because the notification can be repeated for a certain number of times with it displayed on the screen, and then it is hidden away in the notifications panel. Perfect for when you aren't actually attached to your phone in real life.  Edit: I'm going to stop using this app because when the notification is dismissed, I am taken to BZ Reminder's screen and away from what I was busy doing, which interrupts my work flow. Does the paid version do that?

author: Candromero S
comment: I have just transferred from anoying lifereminders, and it looks promising for now. Very easy to use. Hope it doesn't start with stupid ads..

author: Kate Sawyer
comment: I tried a few disappointing apps before landing on this one, but this one makes up for all the rest. Simple to use and, best of all, reliable. I would highly recommend.
Very good. Urgent fix required. Date picker shows garbled characters for cancel and okay. Language selected is English.

author: Gary Gizmo
comment: Great app. I would rate it 5 stars and buy the pro if I could silence it during do not disturb and if you would offer an option for an analog clock to use your finger to set the time quicker. Other than that, a great app.

author: Shawn Shahaei
comment: Very good application. The only thing missing is Location alert. It becomes very important feature for alert application. Thank you and Good luck.

author: Mohamed Alhefny
comment: It's great app but I can't change the notification tone?!! I tried to change it but after I did each time it returns to the default!! Any help or recommendations to solve this issue?!

author: David Victorious
comment: It's really nice, except daylight saving time confuses it. I have a reminder for every other Thursday, which the app switches to Fridays during daylight saving time.

author: Adrian Power
comment: Simple and straightforward. No unnecessary rubbish. Great widget allows you to enter reminders very easily. If you're looking for a basic reminder app this is it.

author: Nuria Pugh
comment: It actually has me on top of things. Even though its annoying, it reminds me constantly so I just can't forget

author: SUNDAR RAM
comment: Looks good. I've been using it for a while now. Guess this is one among the best reminders right now! I'd suggest this app to others.
It's the best Android ap I've tried.  The others don't pop up if you don't either edit or select complete.  This one does!
I'm using this for positive affirmations, reminders to drink water, and stretch at work. Love it.

author: William Anderson
comment: Great clean and simple interface, perfect for everyday task managing. Repeat task system and colouring makes things much easier.

author: aleks vujisic
comment: When in silent mode thwrw is no alarm sound ....bad bad bad

author: Chandrasekhar Poranki
comment: Would have been even better for me if the widget in notification had filter to view only past reminders that are pending.

author: Elandra Williams
comment: It retains my tasks/reminders once I complete them. Its easy to use and the snoozing functionality is awesome.

author: Chloe Carter
comment: It's a great app, I just wish you could repeat reminders every 5 minutes or so.

author: Tanuj Paul
comment: I m not able to work in it

author: Vojta Hovis
comment: Definitely best app for notifications, it will be awesome if there will be option have notifications like - first saturday in month...

author: Nico Müller
comment: I just love it so much😊 But could you guys please add Google Calendar synchronisation?

author: Sergey Nagolov
comment: I didn't get this app. The sync with Contacts is missing. What's the purpose of the app?!
I've had better reminder apps. But still a good reminder app. Easy to use. It does what It's suppose to.

author: James Michaels
comment: I like this app a lot. It runs smoothly and reliably. It does what it says it will and it does that well. Good stuff

author: Ian James
comment: Love the text reminder, hate that it doesn't have categories.

author: Scott Ranck
comment: This is a fantastic Todo app... Highly recommend it for ease of user and helpfulness towards achieving productivity!!
Brilliant! Love the way it reminds again by vibrating when you next turn your phone on.

author: Nathan Mawhinney
comment: Simply the best. Better than all the rest

author: Eugene Feng
comment: I would give 5 stars and go Pro if there's search button.

author: Bertus Somalinggi
comment: This application help me to manage my time

author: Mike Cardenas
comment: Easy to use. This app will keep you on target with your daily agenda. Works great.

author: Alexander Lee
comment: Clean, professional interface. Best and most convenient app I've tried for reminders.

author: Jayant Patil
comment: Feature to "Search" the reminders etc. is a must in this app. The app deserves a 5 stars after that..... ☺️☺️☺️

author: Yanyan Naagas
comment: Very reliable and it's kept me on track with my tasks so far.

author: Michael Beukes
comment: Awesome. Works every time. Well done do the developer 🙋‍♂️

author: Xabier Ostale
comment: Simple and very effective app.
Everything is good . Also add the feature of Anniversary remiders. That would be great.
